data.text: @GemIsWriting Hopefully everyone’s clear by then and it all comes together as planned - even if a bit late!

@LouMorgan New opening night is Saturday, but as the IOM is still on 10-day isolation rules, unless we get early negatives half the cast won’t get to the theatre till Friday. Which is… stressful to say the least.
@GemIsWriting Oh no! I’m so sorry - hopefully you can get things moving again soon x
@GemIsWriting Ah, that sucks. Hope you're back on track very soon!
